amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to ensure no funding from this bill can be used by the Fish and Wildlife Service to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce its proposed rule to list the Texas Kangaroo Rat as endangered and designate 600,000 acres as critical habitat under the Endangered Species Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
